name: Buluk-Mayan Warfare
description:
Buluk Mayan Warfare is an Aztec/Mayan themed Action-RPG. Players must unite the warring tribes against the rising European threat.

How To Play

Select the city Uxmal to test out our new 3D map. Attacking anything else will freeze the demo.

Try out our new spells Wind Blast and Tidal Wave

Press Start on the controller or esc on the keyboard to bring up the controls.

Make sure to adjust the graphics settings before launch so it the game can work properly on your machine.
